activities: MicroMass Communications is a relationship marketing agency. We provide behavioral-based communication strategies and programs for pharmaceutical clients. We develop solutions that utilize websites, emails, direct mail and call centers. Many of our solutions collect profiles to provide information tailored to the individual.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
orgverification: In house, with some client audits
privacyprograms: MicroMass complies with Safe Harbor, DMA guidelines, HIPAA and COPPA. Our clients are also members of various privacy programs and we are bound by their policies wherever they are more restrictive than our own.
recoursemech: Direct contact with our privacy officer and if the complaint remains unresolved, the Direct Marketing Association (DMA).
